name: FishingGame
description:
This is a project I tried to Solo Develop for the Secret Santa Jam. It's not much but I did something.  It's pretty aimless, so don't expect any big surprises.

Hope you like it, Carlos J

Press E to Interact with Signs and start fishing. 

USE AWSD Keys to move around. Look around with the Mouse.

If the Fishing Pole moves, hold down the Left Mouse Button to reel in the Catch

When Swimming, you automatically move forward, so move the mouse to steer.

Assets Used:

RPG Fishing by Jazary

Cartoon Water Shader by  Sandvector Studios

Advanced Celshader by Skull-Materials

Advanced  Flock System & Tropical Fish by Craft Asset Studio

Development by Kamataya using Unreal Engine.

Merry Christmas.
